name: Best Food Ive Had in Ages
description: Its very hard to find good mexican food, and no not Taco Bell. That is trash, im talking about authentic Tacos.

name: Best Park to take your son on a hot day!
description: Miami is hot, almost all year rong! So where can you take him? How about a cool airconditioned indoor park!

name: Not a good day!
description: Yes, sometimes days are good, sometimes they are terrible! Lighten up and have an ice cream!
